paper_abstract: Let I be a finite set of words and double right arrow(I)* be the derivation relation generated by the set of productions {epsilon --> u \ u is an element of I}. Let L-I(epsilon) be the set of words u such that epsilon double right arrow(I)* u. We prove that the set I is unavoidable if and only if the relation double right arrow(I) *, is a well quasi-order on lthe set L-I(epsilon). This result generalizes a theorem of [Ehrenfeucht et al., Theor. Comput. Sci. 27 (1983) 311-332]. Further generalizations are investigated.
paper_title: Well quasi-orders, unavoidable sets, and derivation systems
